Peoria.Glendale Municipal Airport:
Glendale Municipal Airport (ICAO: KGEU, FAA LID: GEU) is a city owned, public use airport located six nautical miles (7 mi, 11 km) west of the central business district of Glendale, a city in Maricopa County, Arizona, United States. It is included in the National Plan of Integrated Airport Systems for 2011–2015, which categorized it as a general aviation reliever airport.
Although most U.S. airports use the same three-letter location identifier for the FAA and IATA, this airport is assigned GEU by the FAA but has no designation from the IATA The airport's ICAO identifier is KGEU.


== Facilities and aircraft ==
Glendale Municipal Airport covers an area of 514 acres (208 ha) at an elevation of 1,071 feet (326 m) above mean sea level.
